title: Stylish 2-Bedroom Apartment with Terrace in Ustka's Port District
description: Step into modern comfort in this luminous 58 sqm apartment designed for relaxed living and smart investment. With two cozy bedrooms, a thoughtfully designed bathroom, and chic hardwood floors throughout, the space is both stylish and functional. A bright living area flows seamlessly onto your private terrace—perfect for entertaining, unwinding after work, or welcoming sea breezes. An included storage room answers all organizational needs, while contemporary finishes create a move-in-ready ambiance.
neighborhood_description: The Port District of Ustka embodies an active and open-air coastal lifestyle, with scenic pedestrian paths, accessible bike routes, and a laid-back atmosphere. Well served by roadway connections for easy commuting, the area is increasingly attractive for families and professionals seeking balance between the sea, city access, and nearby schools. Enjoy the neighborly feel—all with the Słupia port and sandy beaches just minutes away.
lifestyle_benefits: ideal for investment or rental income
target_buyer: Property investors and young professionals seeking turnkey coastal living with high rental potential, or those looking to enjoy low-maintenance escapes by the sea.
market_positioning: This property stands out as a premium opportunity in Ustka, leveraging its seaside character, strategic price point, and rental yield for those capitalizing on the rise in demand for contemporary coastal apartments in secondary Polish markets.
